              porpentine
              ;

speaker: YORK
text:
And
               
              in
               
              the

text:
Him

text:
Shaking

              his

text:
Full

              ,

text:
Hath

              with
               
              the

              ,

speaker: YORK
text:
And
               
              undiscovered
               
              come
               
              to
               
              me

text:
And
               
              given
               
              me

              of
               
              their

              .

speaker: YORK
text:
This
               
              devil
               
              here
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              my
               
              substitute
              ;

speaker: YORK
text:
For
               
              that
               
              John
               
              Mortimer
              ,
               
              which

speaker: YORK
text:
In

speaker: YORK
text:
By
               
              this
              ,

              mind

speaker: YORK
text:
How
               
              they

text:
Say
